entries.description: Added logos and descriptions for the addons. In order to see the logos and description, addons have to be configured with AddonConfig CRDs with the same names as addons.
Kubernetes End-of-Life for v1.14 support ended.
The authorized_keys files on nodes are now updated whenever the SSH keys for a cluster are changed
Added User Settings, Cluster Addons management, RBAC management functionality and new Project View
Cluster namespaces could end up stuck in Terminating state when deleting a cluster
Added support for external Cloud Controller Manager
